title: 7.2 New patch completely f'''d the client Mac  (img included)
body:
so just updated to latest patch and this is what my client looks like

http://imgur.com/DN1IWC0

can type in my pass but once loaded client still looks bronken AF

please help, cant scroll down to open legacy client to see if thats fukd too 

please help

replies.body:
This formatting problem may be an issue with your current OS version.  If you're running Lion or an older version then you may run into these weird visual problems.  Updating your OSX to a more recent version or even Sierra should resolve this.

You can update your OS version to the latest available from Apple to resolve this problem:

* Click the Apple icon on the top left of the screen, and choose "Software Update..."
* The App store will open and display any software updates available for OS X and the App Store. OS X updates will be at the top of the list.
* Click "Update All" to install all available software updates. If prompted, enter an admin name and password, then your Apple ID and password
* If required, restart your system

I hope that helps!

I find this somewhat discouraging that i have to update my OS for the sake of new client when i was lead to believe that new client would run on the same toasters as previous client

i have circumvented the problem temporarily by directly opening legacy client from program files 
I will upgrade my OS when the new client is forced on me
The new client will still run on the same toaster hardware. It's the software that isn't compatible. No developers are still intentionally supporting anything previous to 10.6 on mac.
To clarify, it's an issue we're currently looking into and the update is just a workaround for now.  It's perfectly okay to use the legacy for now as well.   Thanks for the feedback!

That's nice to know, Thanks for the reply 
have a nice day :)
